field.name: OB_SPC
field.description: Option byte security protection value 0xA5 : no security protection any value except 0xA5 or 0xCC : protection level low 0xCC : protection level high

field.name: OB_SPC_N
field.description: OB_SPC complement value

field.name: BOR_TH
field.description: BOR_TH 0: No BOR 1: Have BOR, brownout threshold level (2.6V)

field.name: OTA
field.description: OTA

field.name: BB
field.description: BB 0: boot from bootloader, when configured boot from main memory 1: No effect

field.name: nRST_STDBY
field.brief: Generate a reset instead of entering standby mode
field.description: nRST_STDBY 0: generate a reset instead of entering standby mode 1: no reset when entering standby mode

field.name: nRST_DPSLP
field.brief: Generate a reset instead of entering Deep-sleep mode
field.description: nRST_DPSLP 0: generate a reset instead of entering Deep-sleep mode 1: no reset when entering Deep-sleep mode

field.name: nWDG_HW
field.description: nWDG_HW 0: hardware free watchdog 1: software free watchdog

field.name: LKVAL[15:0]
field.description: Option bytes 1 Lock Value 0x33CC : Lock Option bytes 1, the Option bytes 1 cannot be modified any more other value : Do not lock Option bytes 1

field.name: EPLOAD
field.brief: Load EPLOAD of option byte 1 after reset
field.description: Load EPLOAD of option byte 1 after reset. This bit can be write by software when OB1LK is 0

field.name: EPSIZE[3:0]
field.brief: Load EPSIZE of option byte 1 after reset
field.description: Load EPSIZE of option byte 1 after reset. These bits can be write by software when OB1LK is 0

field.name: EFALC[3:0]
field.brief: Load EFALC of option byte 1 after reset
field.description: Load EFALC of option byte 1 after reset. These bits can be write by software when OB1LK is 0

field.name: OB_SPC
field.description: Option byte security protection value 0xA5 : no security protection any value except 0xA5 or 0xCC : protection level low 0xCC : protection level high

field.name: OB_SPC_N
field.description: OB_SPC complement value

field.name: BOR_TH
field.description: BOR_TH 0: No BOR 1: Have BOR, brownout threshold level (2.6V)

field.name: OTA
field.description: OTA

field.name: BB
field.description: BB 0: boot from bootloader, when configured boot from main memory 1: No effect

field.name: nRST_STDBY
field.brief: Generate a reset instead of entering standby mode
field.description: nRST_STDBY 0: generate a reset instead of entering standby mode 1: no reset when entering standby mode

field.name: nRST_DPSLP
field.brief: Generate a reset instead of entering Deep-sleep mode
field.description: nRST_DPSLP 0: generate a reset instead of entering Deep-sleep mode 1: no reset when entering Deep-sleep mode

field.name: nWDG_HW
field.description: nWDG_HW 0: hardware free watchdog 1: software free watchdog

field.name: OB_USER_N
field.description: OB_USER complement value

field.name: OB_DATA[7:0]
field.description: user defined data bit 7 to 0

field.description: OB_DATA complement value bit 7 to 0
